name: YSBM Group
description:
We are a European software engineering company based in Krakow, Poland established in 2014.
We provide custom development services aiming at sophisticated web and mobile solutions.
Our flexible development approach enables us to provide you with many sorts of solutions according to highest industry standards. We cover an extensive range of intensively developing areas and we have experience in intelligent e-learning, smart houses, VoIP, B2B SAAS aggregating platforms for different specific services: (real estate, medicine, publishing business), CRM and task management systems, catalogs and e-commerce and other custom solutions.
Our values
Approach
Follow Agile methodology
Use recent technology trends
Provide dedicated engineers
Strong project management assistance
Project oriented methods
Quality
High code quality standards
Extremely thorough QA process
Code maintenance
Senior and Middle level engineers only
All engineers have a technical university degree 
Time and management
Meet deadlines
Motivated and result-oriented team
Daily reports and time tracking
Work in CET (+1GMT)
